```{r}
test_func <- function(train_exp){
  tryCatch(
    {
      train <- read.csv(train_exp)
      message('This is the function')
      return(train)
    },
    error = function(cond) {
      message('Please download from xyz')
      message(cond)
      return(NA)
    },
    finally = {
      message('this is the last part of the trycatch')
    }
    )
}
```

```{r}
what <- test_func('../data/raw/Train.csv')
```

head(what)
